statements: SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage;
SELECT officer_id, incident_date, file_path FROM body_camera_footage WHERE location = 'Police Station';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM body_camera_footage ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT officer_id, duration FROM body_camera_footage WHERE resolution LIKE '%HD%' ORDER BY officer_id ASC;
SELECT footage_id, tags->'category' AS category FROM body_camera_footage WHERE tags->'priority' = 'high';
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage WHERE officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY incident_date DESC, duration ASC
SELECT footage_id, file_path, location FROM body_camera_footage WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01' AND location LIKE '%Roosevelt%'
SELECT officer_id, incident_date, resolution FROM body_camera_footage WHERE resolution = 'HD' ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT officer_id, COUNT(footage_id) AS total_footage FROM body_camera_footage GROUP BY officer_id HAVING total_footage > 5
SELECT file_path, tags FROM body_camera_footage WHERE tags @> '{"category": "traffic stop"}' ORDER BY incident_date
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage;
SELECT id, footage_url, timestamp, officer_id FROM body_camera_footage WHERE officer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM officer_details WHERE department = 'Police Department';
SELECT name, badge_number FROM officer_details WHERE officer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage WHERE officer_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, officer_id FROM body_camera_footage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT officer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_footage FROM body_camera_footage GROUP BY officer_id;
SELECT officer_id, name, badge_number, department FROM officer_details LEFT JOIN body_camera_footage ON officer_details.officer_id = body_camera_footage.officer_id;
SELECT timestamp, footage_url FROM body_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM officer_details;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM officer_details WHERE badge_number = '12345';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, description FROM incident_reports WHERE officer_id = 'e8d5a6d6-88be-4f73-a2e2-7a104653bfd0';
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_footage WHERE officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT officer_id, timestamp FROM body_camera_footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM officer_details WHERE badge_number = '12345';
SELECT * FROM incident_reports WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(report_id), officer_id FROM incident_reports GROUP BY officer_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_videos WHERE video_id = 1001;
SELECT officer_id, first_name, last_name FROM officers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM incidents WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actions WHERE action_type = 'Arrest' AND action_id > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT badge_number, CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS full_name FROM officers WHERE badge_number LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY badge_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_videos WHERE officer_id = 1234;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM officers WHERE badge_number = '789ABC';
SELECT location, date FROM incidents WHERE incident_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM actions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT incident_id, action_type FROM actions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM body_camera_videos;
SELECT officer_id, location, timestamp FROM incidents ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT description, outcome FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM officers WHERE department = 'Police Department' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT analysis_result, timestamp FROM footage_analysis WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM body_camera_videos WHERE officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT video_id, location, timestamp FROM body_camera_videos WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT officer_id, COUNT(video_id) FROM body_camera_videos GROUP BY officer_id HAVING COUNT(video_id) > 5;
SELECT incident_id, timestamp, description FROM incidents WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' AND outcome = 'Under Investigation';
SELECT name, badge_number, department FROM officers INNER JOIN departments ON officers.department = departments.department_id ORDER BY department, name;
